record.title: HOUR OF MEETING ON TOMORROW

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: OBERSTAR
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, pursuant to clause 4 of rule XVI, I move that when the House adjourns on this legislative day, it adjourn to meet at 9 a.m. tomorrow.

record.chair: The question is on the motion.

speaking-unknown-id.title: Mr.
speaking-unknown-id.name: MICA
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on that I demand the yeas and nays.

record.narrative: The yeas and nays were ordered.
record.chair: Pursuant to clause 8 and clause 9 of rule XX, this 15-minute vote on the motion to change the convening time will be followed by 5-minute votes on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to H.R. 3248; and adoption of the conference report on H.R. 1495.
